export-entities.name: ACTION/Access
export-entities.pql:
ID 34 STATUS APPROVED CREATOR "0" ACCESS_POLICY ACCESS_CONTROL PBAC FOR TRUE ON ADMIN BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON APPROVE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DELETE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON DEPLOY BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON READ BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow PBAC FOR TRUE ON WRITE BY appuser.did = 0 DO allow ALLOWED_ENTITIES
COMPONENT "ACTION/Access" = (FALSE OR OPEN)

COMPONENT "ACTION/All File Server Actions" = (OPEN OR RUN OR EDIT OR DELETE OR CHANGE_SECURITY OR CHANGE_ATTRIBUTES OR RENAME)
